After all we had to do to get rid of the hyenas, here we are, facing yet another problem: scarecrow golems.

This place is overrun with {@linkcreature:19#3003#reaping harvester golems} and {@linkcreature:19#3001#berserk harvester golems}! Their weakness is their crystal hearts; destroy that, and the golem shuts down for good.

Please smash the golems and destroy their crystal hearts, then bring the debris to me. I can't escort the merchants until we know the scarecrow golems are no longer a threat.
Without their <font color='#660000'>crystal hearts</font>, these golems will never threaten anyone again. Thank you. You've saved the day, <PCNAME>.

Destroy the {@linkcreature:19#3003#reaping harvester golems} and {@linkcreature:19#3001#berserk harvester golems} around Filton's Dairy Farm and collect their <font color='#660000'>crystal hearts</font>.
